name: 叶甫盖尼·齐加诺夫
name_full: 叶甫盖尼·齐加诺夫 Yevgeni Tsyganov
introduction: 小时候就展露其与众不同的表演天赋，参与俄罗斯知名剧团Taganka的演出，为日后的戏剧之路打下良好基础。长大后伊夫杰尼不但持续参与各类表演，更在学院里接受严谨的理论训练，先后专研钢琴演奏、导演、戏剧表演等领域。演戏之余，多才多艺的伊夫杰尼还自组乐团担任主唱与吉他手的角色。外型性格抢眼的伊夫杰尼在俄罗斯拥有广大的影迷，参与多部电视影集与电影的演出。Since 1993 played in a rock band “A.S.”. In 1997 Yevgeni formed a band called “Toast”, which released one album and broke up in 2004, but reunited in 2009.In 1996 he entered the Shchukin Theater School and in 2001 joined the Moscow theater “Pyotr Fomenko Studio”.Yevgeni’s debut role was in the film by Yuri Grymov “Collector” in 2001.The actor got a prize at the film festival “Kinotavr” (2002, for his role in the film “Let’s Make Love”).Yevgeni married a Russian actress Irina Leonova（《阿尔巴特街的儿女》中莲娜的扮演者。演员伊戈尔的同学和前妻。）. They have five children. They say, they are waiting for the sixth child!Selected filmography2003 – Walk2004 – Children of the Arbat2005 – Dreaming of Space2006 – Hunter2006 – Peter FM2007 – Mermaid2007 – Red Pearl of Love2009 – Hot News2009 – Ivan the Terrible2010 – Happy End2010 – The Brest Fortress2011 – The chicks2012 – Entropy2012 – It was not me2012 – The Legend of Love2013 – Area2013 – Thaw (film by Valeri Todorovski)Roles in the theater2000 – “One Absolutely Happy Village”2002 – “Crime and Punishment” by F. Dostoevsky2003 – “Twelfth Night” (International Chekhov Festival, London Theatre Cheek by Jowl, directed by D. Donnellan)2008 – “Bride” by Alexander Ostrovsky2009 – “Papa” (Independent Theatre Project)
